review: I was able to side-load Kodi media center and use it to access my videos and music shares from my server.Since the amazon fire tv box has a usb port  I had wanted to use it instead (it's even more expensive than the stick) so I could plug an external hard disk in that would contain my media files.  According to the internet this no longer works after a certain firmware revision and it appears the new ones have the newer firmware.The fire tv stick works fine - I just would have preferred the more expensive set-top fire tv.  I think it was a bad decision if they really did remove external drive support.  I was told it was of concerns of recording rented shows.
author: Amazon Customer
